text: This list is of the Cultural Properties of Japan designated in the category of for the Prefecture of Kōchi. ==National Cultural Properties== As of 1 June 2015, twenty Important Cultural Properties (including one *National Treasure) with sixty component structures have been designated, being of national significance. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;" |- !width="25%" comprises two components: the honden and heiden-haiden || 150px 150px || || |- |} ==Prefectural Cultural Properties== As of 1 May 2014, eleven properties have been designated at a prefectural level. Properties== As of 1 May 2014, eighty-eight properties have been designated at a municipal level. ==Registered Cultural Properties== As of 1 June 2015, two hundred and seventy-three properties at ninety-four sites have been registered (as opposed to designated) at a national level. ==See also== * Cultural Properties of Japan * National Treasures of Japan * List of Historic Sites of Japan
